metadata.title: CVE-2022-48197 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** Reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) existsin Sandbox examples in the YUI2 repository. The download distributions,TreeView component and the YUI Javascript library overall are not affected.NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products that are no longer supportedby the maintainer.

criterions.comment: yui package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
